text.__SUMMARY__: Odostomia jonesii is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Pyramidellidae, the pyrams and their allies.
text.Description: The shell grows to a length of 3.5 mm.
text.Distribution: This species occurs in the Atlantic Ocean off the Bermudas.
